rukus.text: 9|119|he eemaan vaalo! allaah se daro tatha sachon ke saath ho jao.

9|120|madeena ke vaasiyon tatha unake aas-paas ke dehaatiyon ke lie uchit nahin tha ki allaah ke rasool se peechhe rah jaayen aur apane praanon ko aapake praan se priy samajhen. ye isalie ki unhen allaah kee raah mein koee pyaas aur thakaan tatha bhook nahin pahunchatee hai aur na ve kisee aise sthaan ko rondate hain, jo kaafiron ko apriy ho ya kisee shatru se vah koee saphalata praapt nahin karate hain, parantu unake lie ek satkarm likh diya jaata hai. vaastav mein, allaah satkarmiyon ka phal vyarth nahin karata.

9|121|aur ve (allaah kee raah mein) thoda ya adhik, jo bhee vyay karate hain, aur jo bhee ghaatee paar karate hain, use unake lie likh diya jaata hai, taaki vah unhen usase uttam pratiphal pradaan kare, jo ve kar rahe the.

9|122|eemaan vaalon ke lie uchit nahin ki sab ek saath nikal paden; to kyon nahin pratyek samudaay se ek giroh nikalata, taaki dharm mein bodh grahan karen aur taaki apanee jaati ko saavadhaan karen, jab unakee or vaapas aayen, sambhavatah ve (kukarmon se) bachen[1].
